job description:
Job Description
What will I do as a Modeler?

We are looking for strong, experienced individuals with experience in Business Intelligence Architecture (BI) and Analytical (OLAP) Modeling. Ideal candidate will be 60% client facing/team responsibilities and 40% hands-on involvement on building solutions. Sound Good? This position for you! Salary is negotiable and commensurate with experience.

What are the qualifications?

Position - Director

Relevant Years of Experience - 7+ yrs

Location - Chicago

Qualifications

Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related (must-have). Masters in Computers/Analytics/Business administration and/or additional technical or project management certifications will be a plus

Work domain

Business Intelligence Architecture (BI) and Analytical (OLAP) Modeling

Work mix - 40 % client facing/managerial responsibilities and 60% hands-on involvement on building solutions

Travel - Yes. 3-5 days a month

Team management responsibilities - Yes - 2 -5 members

Technical skills - Business Intelligence products

One or more of the following - SAP HANA, Microsoft Analysis services, QlikView, Tableau, Cognos, Hyperion, Powepivot, Pentaho, Microstrategy, Oracle BI , other BI products

Scripting Languages - Python, Perl, C#, C/C++

ETL Tools ( ETL - extract, transform and load data)

One or more of the following DataStage, Informatica, Talend, Ab initio, Microsoft Integration services, Aptar, Syncsort

Databases - One or more of the following - Postgres, Hadoop, Oracle, IBM DB2, MS SQL, Netezza, Teradata, Sybase

Big Data ecosystem - Hadoop, Mongo, NoSQL, Spark, Tachyon

Statistical and simulation tools - R, MLPack, SPSS, SAS, Mat LAB

Background, Domain and Soft skills - Creative, experienced and skilled enough to not require detailed requirements and who can take direction and operate independently. Not hesitant to put out ideas and review options with a broader group

Strong communication and client facing skills - review issues, collect requirements, iterate on options, present solutions/model results to clients, gain client buy-in

Aptitude for numbers and strong quantitative skills

Team player and able to work well with both onsite and virtual teams (from other locations in US and India)

Worked directly or delivered large scale analytics and datawarehouse projects to clients in consumer packaged goods/retail/pharma/finance/telecom verticals

Any prior experience with other large market research firms/BI consulting divisions from larger companies (Oracle, Microsoft, SAP, IBM, Accenture) will be a plus

Any prior experience working with multi site teams - onshore/offshore will be a plus
